quiz.question: foamy _____
quiz.explanation: 泡沫的，泡沫的波浪。The foamy waves crashed against the rocky shore. 泡沫的波浪冲击着岩石海岸。

quiz.question: slimy _____
quiz.explanation: 黏糊糊的，黏糊糊的痕迹。The snail left a slimy trail across the garden path. 蜗牛在花园小路上留下了黏糊糊的痕迹。

quiz.question: grimy _____
quiz.explanation: 肮脏的，肮脏的手。The mechanic wiped his grimy hands on a rag. 机械师用抹布擦拭他肮脏的手。

quiz.question: balmy _______
quiz.explanation: 温和的，温和的夜晚。They enjoyed a romantic walk on the balmy evening. 他们在温和的夜晚享受浪漫的散步。

quiz.question: clammy _____
quiz.explanation: 湿冷的，湿冷的手掌。His clammy palms betrayed his nervousness during the interview. 他湿冷的手掌在面试时暴露了他的紧张。

quiz.question: scummy ____
quiz.explanation: 浮渣的，浮渣的池塘。The abandoned scummy pond was covered with algae. 废弃的浮渣的池塘覆盖着藻类。

quiz.question: gloomy ____
quiz.explanation: 忧郁的，忧郁的心情。The rainy weather put everyone in a gloomy mood. 下雨的天气让每个人都陷入忧郁的心情。

quiz.question: barmy ____
quiz.explanation: 疯狂的，疯狂的想法。His barmy idea to swim across the channel was rejected. 他游过海峡的疯狂的想法被拒绝了。

quiz.question: teeny ____
quiz.explanation: 极小的，极小的微小。The teeny tiny kitten could fit in the palm of her hand. 极小的微小小猫可以放在她的手掌里。

quiz.question: weeny ___
quiz.explanation: 极小的，极小的一点。Just a weeny bit of sugar will do for my tea. 我的茶只需要极小的一点糖就行了。

quiz.question: brainy ___
quiz.explanation: 聪明的，聪明的孩子。The brainy kid solved the math problem in seconds. 聪明的孩子在几秒钟内解决了数学题。

quiz.question: spiny ______
quiz.explanation: 多刺的，多刺的仙人掌。Be careful not to touch the spiny cactus. 小心不要碰多刺的仙人掌。

quiz.question: ____ cranny
quiz.explanation: 裂缝，岩石裂缝。The lizard hid in a small rock cranny. 蜥蜴躲在一个小的岩石裂缝里。

quiz.question: tinny _____
quiz.explanation: 尖细的，尖细的声音。The cheap radio produced a tinny sound. 廉价的收音机发出尖细的声音。

quiz.question: runny ____
quiz.explanation: 流鼻涕的，流鼻涕的鼻子。The child with a cold had a runny nose. 感冒的孩子有流鼻涕的鼻子。

quiz.question: bony _____
quiz.explanation: 骨瘦如柴的，骨瘦如柴的身躯。The elderly man had a thin, bony frame. 老人有瘦弱骨瘦如柴的身躯。

quiz.question: __ agony
quiz.explanation: 痛苦，处于痛苦中。The injured athlete writhed in agony on the field. 受伤的运动员在场上痛苦地扭动。

quiz.question: loony ___
quiz.explanation: 疯人院，疯人院。The expression loony bin is an outdated term for a psychiatric hospital. '疯人院'这个表达是精神病院的过时术语。

quiz.question: ___ crony
quiz.explanation: 老朋友，老朋友。He met up with an old crony from his university days. 他与大学时代的老朋友见面了。

quiz.question: scrawny ___
quiz.explanation: 瘦骨嶙峋的，瘦骨嶙峋的猫。The scrawny cat looked like it hadn't eaten in days. 瘦骨嶙峋的猫看起来好像好几天没吃东西了。

quiz.question: tawny ___
quiz.explanation: 黄褐色的，黄褐色的猫头鹰。The tawny owl hooted softly in the night. 黄褐色的猫头鹰在夜里轻声叫着。

quiz.question: _____ buoy
quiz.explanation: 浮标，海洋浮标。The fishermen tied their boat to an ocean buoy. 渔民们把船系在海洋浮标上。

quiz.question: __ envoy
quiz.explanation: 特使，联合国特使。The UN envoy negotiated a ceasefire between the warring parties. 联合国特使在交战双方之间谈判停火。

quiz.question: _____ convoy
quiz.explanation: 车队，卡车车队。A truck convoy delivered humanitarian aid to the disaster zone. 卡车车队向灾区运送人道主义援助。

quiz.question: soapy _____
quiz.explanation: 肥皂的，肥皂水。She washed the dishes in soapy water. 她用肥皂水洗碗。

quiz.question: dumpy ______
quiz.explanation: 矮胖的，矮胖的身材。The woman felt self-conscious about her dumpy figure. 这个女人对自己矮胖的身材感到难为情。

quiz.question: jumpy ______
quiz.explanation: 紧张的，紧张的神经。His jumpy nerves made him start at every sound. 他紧张的神经让他被每个声音吓一跳。

quiz.question: lumpy _____
quiz.explanation: 结块的，结块的肉汁。The poorly made lumpy gravy ruined the dinner. 做得不好的结块的肉汁毁了晚餐。

quiz.question: loopy ____
quiz.explanation: 疯狂的，疯狂的想法。His loopy idea to build a rocket in the garage was impractical. 他在车库里建造火箭的疯狂的想法不切实际。

quiz.question: droopy ____
quiz.explanation: 下垂的，下垂的眼睛。The tired dog had droopy eyes that made it look sad. 疲倦的狗有下垂的眼睛，看起来很悲伤。

quiz.question: whippy ______
quiz.explanation: 柔韧的，柔韧的树枝。The whippy branch bent easily in the wind. 柔韧的树枝在风中容易弯曲。

quiz.question: sloppy ____
quiz.explanation: 草率的，草率的工作。The student's sloppy work earned him a poor grade. 学生草率的工作让他得了低分。

quiz.question: wispy ______
quiz.explanation: 稀疏的，稀疏的云。Wispy clouds drifted across the blue sky. 稀疏的云在蓝天上飘过。

quiz.question: preoccupy ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使全神贯注，使头脑全神贯注。Worries about the future would preoccupy the mind of the anxious student. 对未来的担忧会使焦虑学生的头脑全神贯注。

quiz.question: _______ apothecary
quiz.explanation: 药剂师，村庄药剂师。The village apothecary mixed herbs to cure common ailments. 村庄药剂师混合草药来治疗常见疾病。

quiz.question: bleary ____
quiz.explanation: 模糊的，模糊的眼睛。He woke up with bleary eyes after staying up all night. 熬夜一整夜后，他醒来时眼睛模糊的眼睛。

quiz.question: sugary _____
quiz.explanation: 含糖的，含糖的甜食。The dentist warned against eating too many sugary sweet treats. 牙医警告不要吃太多含糖的甜食。

quiz.question: ____ infirmary
quiz.explanation: 医务室，城市医务室。The injured worker was taken to the city infirmary. 受伤的工人被送到城市医务室。

quiz.question: diversionary ______
quiz.explanation: 转移注意力的，转移注意力的策略。The army used a diversionary tactic to confuse the enemy. 军队使用转移注意力的策略来迷惑敌人。

quiz.question: precautionary _______
quiz.explanation: 预防性的，预防性的措施。The school took precautionary measure by canceling classes during the storm. 学校在暴风雨期间取消课程作为预防性的措施。

quiz.question: momentary _____
quiz.explanation: 短暂的，短暂的失误。A momentary lapse in concentration caused the driver to miss the turn. 短暂的失误让司机错过了转弯。

quiz.question: unwary ________
quiz.explanation: 不警惕的，不警惕的旅行者。The pickpocket targeted unwary traveler in the crowded market. 扒手在拥挤的市场上瞄准不警惕的旅行者。

quiz.question: ______ outcry
quiz.explanation: 强烈抗议，公众强烈抗议。The controversial decision sparked a public outcry. 这个有争议的决定引发了公众强烈抗议。

quiz.question: rubbery _______
quiz.explanation: 橡胶般的，橡胶般的质地。The overcooked chicken had an unpleasant rubbery texture. 煮过头的鸡肉有令人不快的橡胶般的质地。

quiz.question: ___ doddery
quiz.explanation: 蹒跚的，年迈蹒跚的。The old doddery man shuffled slowly down the street. 年迈蹒跚的老人在街上慢慢拖着脚走。

quiz.question: spidery ___________
quiz.explanation: 细长的，细长的笔迹。The doctor's spidery handwriting was difficult to read. 医生细长的笔迹很难辨认。

quiz.question: thundery _______
quiz.explanation: 雷雨的，雷雨的阵雨。The forecast predicted thundery showers in the afternoon. 天气预报预测下午有雷雨的阵雨。

quiz.question: cheery ________
quiz.explanation: 愉快的，愉快的问候。She gave everyone a cheery greeting as they arrived. 当大家到达时，她给了每个人愉快的问候。

quiz.question: gingery _____
quiz.explanation: 姜味的，姜味的味道。The cookies had a pleasant gingery taste. 饼干有令人愉快的姜味的味道。

quiz.question: ____ treachery
quiz.explanation: 背叛，卑鄙的背叛。The knight was accused of base treachery against the king. 骑士被指控对国王进行卑鄙的背叛。

quiz.question: feathery _____
quiz.explanation: 轻如羽毛的，轻如羽毛的轻盈。The ballerina moved with feathery light grace across the stage. 芭蕾舞演员在舞台上以轻如羽毛的轻盈优雅地移动。

quiz.question: leathery ____
quiz.explanation: 粗糙的，粗糙的皮肤。Years of sun exposure gave the farmer leathery skin. 多年的阳光照射让农夫有了粗糙的皮肤。

quiz.question: whiskery ____
quiz.explanation: 长胡须的，长胡须的下巴。The old man had a rough, whiskery chin. 老人有粗糙长胡须的下巴。

quiz.question: papery ____
quiz.explanation: 纸一样薄的，纸一样薄的皮肤。The elderly woman's papery skin was delicate and fragile. 老妇人纸一样薄的皮肤又细腻又脆弱。

quiz.question: peppery ______
quiz.explanation: 暴躁的，暴躁的脾气。The chef was known for his peppery temper in the kitchen. 这位厨师以在厨房里暴躁的脾气而闻名。

quiz.question: watery ____
quiz.explanation: 稀薄的，稀薄的汤。The disappointed diners complained about the watery soup. 失望的食客抱怨稀薄的汤。

quiz.question: splintery ____
quiz.explanation: 多刺的，多刺的木头。Be careful with that old splintery wood bench. 小心那张旧的多刺的木头长椅。

quiz.question: wintery _____
quiz.explanation: 冬天的，冬天的寒意。A wintery chill filled the air as snow began to fall. 当雪开始下时，空气中充满了冬天的寒意。

quiz.question: blustery ___
quiz.explanation: 狂风大作的，狂风大作的日子。The blustery day made it difficult to keep an umbrella upright. 狂风大作的日子让伞很难保持直立。

quiz.question: glittery _____
quiz.explanation: 闪闪发光的，闪闪发光的连衣裙。She wore a glittery dress to the New Year's Eve party. 她穿着闪闪发光的连衣裙去参加新年前夜派对。

quiz.question: shivery ____
quiz.explanation: 寒冷的，寒冷的冷。The shivery cold made everyone huddle by the fireplace. 寒冷的冷让每个人都挤在壁炉旁。

quiz.question: silvery _________
quiz.explanation: 银色的，银色的月光。Silvery moonlight illuminated the quiet garden. 银色的月光照亮了安静的花园。

quiz.question: flowery ______
quiz.explanation: 华丽的，华丽的演讲。The politician's flowery speech was full of empty promises. 政客华丽的演讲充满了空洞的承诺。

quiz.question: airy ____
quiz.explanation: 通风的，通风的房间。The airy room had large windows that let in plenty of light. 通风的房间有大窗户，让大量光线进入。

quiz.question: wiry _____
quiz.explanation: 瘦而结实的，瘦而结实的身躯。The marathon runner had a lean, wiry frame. 马拉松运动员有精瘦的瘦而结实的身躯。

quiz.question: ____ __ chivalry
quiz.explanation: 骑士精神，骑士精神准则。The medieval knights followed a strict code of chivalry. 中世纪骑士遵循严格的骑士精神准则。

quiz.question: accusatory ____
quiz.explanation: 指责的，指责的语气。Her accusatory tone made him feel defensive. 她指责的语气让他感到防御。

quiz.question: savory _____
quiz.explanation: 咸味的，咸味的小吃。He preferred savory snack like chips over sweet desserts. 他更喜欢咸味的小吃，如薯片，而不是甜点。

quiz.question: pry ____
quiz.explanation: 撬开，撬开。He used a crowbar to pry open the stuck door. 他用撬棍撬开卡住的门。

quiz.question: tarry _ _____
quiz.explanation: 逗留，逗留一会儿。Please tarry a while and enjoy some tea with us. 请逗留一会儿，和我们一起喝茶。

quiz.question: starry _____
quiz.explanation: 繁星的，繁星的夜晚。The campers gazed up at the beautiful starry night. 露营者仰望美丽的繁星的夜晚。

quiz.question: scurry ____
quiz.explanation: 匆忙离开，匆忙离开。The mice would scurry away when the cat appeared. 当猫出现时，老鼠会匆忙离开。

quiz.question: ____ flurry
quiz.explanation: 阵雪，阵雪。A sudden snow flurry surprised the morning commuters. 突然的阵雪让早晨的通勤者感到惊讶。

quiz.question: sultry _____
quiz.explanation: 闷热的，闷热的夜晚。The sultry night made it difficult to sleep without air conditioning. 闷热的夜晚让人没有空调就难以入睡。

quiz.question: _______ pantry
quiz.explanation: 食品储藏室，厨房食品储藏室。She stored canned goods in the kitchen pantry. 她把罐头食品存放在厨房食品储藏室里。

quiz.question: ____ sentry
quiz.explanation: 哨兵，门口哨兵。A gate sentry stood watch at the entrance to the military base. 门口哨兵在军事基地入口处站岗。

quiz.question: wintry ____
quiz.explanation: 冬季的，冬季的风。The wintry wind howled through the bare trees. 冬季的风在光秃秃的树间呼啸。

quiz.question: ______ bigotry
quiz.explanation: 偏执，种族偏执。The civil rights movement fought against racial bigotry. 民权运动反对种族偏执。

quiz.question: palmistry _______
quiz.explanation: 手相术，手相术解读。The fortune teller offered palmistry reading at the fair. 算命师在集市上提供手相术解读。

quiz.question: wry _____
quiz.explanation: 苦笑的，苦笑的微笑。He gave a wry smile at the ironic situation. 他对讽刺的情况露出苦笑的微笑。

quiz.question: __ awry
quiz.explanation: 出差错，出差错。Their carefully laid plans began to go awry. 他们精心制定的计划开始出差错。

quiz.question: greasy _____
quiz.explanation: 油腻的，油腻的小餐馆。They stopped at a greasy spoon diner for breakfast. 他们在一家油腻的小餐馆停下来吃早餐。

quiz.question: ____ queasy
quiz.explanation: 恶心的，感到恶心。The boat ride made her feel queasy. 乘船让她感到恶心。

quiz.question: flimsy ______
quiz.explanation: 站不住脚的，站不住脚的借口。His flimsy excuse for missing work didn't fool anyone. 他缺勤的站不住脚的借口没有骗过任何人。

quiz.question: clumsy _______
quiz.explanation: 笨拙的，笨拙的尝试。His clumsy attempt to fix the computer made things worse. 他修理电脑的笨拙的尝试让事情变得更糟。

quiz.question: teensy ___
quiz.explanation: 极小的，极小的一点。Just add a teensy bit more salt to the recipe. 只需在食谱中加极小的一点盐。

quiz.question: nosy ________
quiz.explanation: 爱管闲事的，爱管闲事的邻居。The nosy neighbor always watched what everyone was doing. 爱管闲事的邻居总是看着每个人在做什么。

quiz.question: _ ___ tipsy
quiz.explanation: 微醺的，有点微醺。After two glasses of wine, she felt a bit tipsy. 喝了两杯酒后，她感到有点微醺。

quiz.question: glassy _____
quiz.explanation: 呆滞的，呆滞的凝视。The shock left her with a glassy stare. 震惊让她呆滞的凝视。

quiz.question: grassy _____
quiz.explanation: 长满草的，长满草的田野。The children played in the grassy field behind the school. 孩子们在学校后面长满草的田野里玩耍。

quiz.question: bossy _____
quiz.explanation: 专横的，专横的人。She was a real bossy boots, always telling others what to do. 她真是个专横的人，总是告诉别人该做什么。

quiz.question: mossy ____
quiz.explanation: 长满苔藓的，长满苔藓的岩石。They sat on the mossy rock by the stream. 他们坐在溪边长满苔藓的岩石上。

quiz.question: fussy _____
quiz.explanation: 挑剔的，挑剔的食客。The fussy eater refused to try any new foods. 挑剔的食客拒绝尝试任何新食物。

quiz.question: ____ _ curtsy
quiz.explanation: 屈膝礼，行屈膝礼。The young girl would make a curtsy when meeting the queen. 小女孩在见到女王时会行屈膝礼。

quiz.question: lousy _______
quiz.explanation: 糟糕的，糟糕的天气。The lousy weather ruined our picnic plans. 糟糕的天气毁了我们的野餐计划。

quiz.question: mousy ____
quiz.explanation: 灰褐色的，灰褐色的头发。She dyed her mousy hair a vibrant red. 她把灰褐色的头发染成了鲜艳的红色。

quiz.question: ____ drowsy
quiz.explanation: 困倦的，感到困倦。The warm room made him feel drowsy. 温暖的房间让他感到困倦。

quiz.question: floaty _____
quiz.explanation: 飘逸的，飘逸的连衣裙。She wore a light, floaty dress perfect for summer. 她穿着一件轻盈飘逸的连衣裙，非常适合夏天。

quiz.question: _____ __ nicety
quiz.explanation: 细节，细节问题。The lawyers argued over every point of nicety in the contract. 律师们争论合同中的每一个细节问题。

quiz.question: rickety _____
quiz.explanation: 摇摇晃晃的，摇摇晃晃的椅子。The rickety chair wobbled dangerously when he sat down. 当他坐下时，摇摇晃晃的椅子危险地摇晃。
